channel.title: It's Hip To Get Hip Surgery
channel.description: Podcast on my experiences with Hip Surgery... with interviews with doctors and patients.
channel.itunes:author: Craig Gordon
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hip Resurfacing / Surgery - My Experience with the Procedure.
channel.itunes:summary: Podcast detailing my experience with Hip Surgery including exclusive phone interviews with doctors and patients who went through the procedure.
